page.title: 06The Surgery, Church Street.
page.content: We visited the Doctor's Surgery. There are two doctors, who are man and wife. The lady doctor is{Dr.Ridley,}and her husband is{Dr.Slade.}Our local doctor used to be{Dr.Fleming,}who is Alexander Fleming's son, but he has retired now.We interviewed the receptionist.They don't have many emergency calls.Blood pressure, diabetes, asthma, ear problems, kidney problems are the main reasons people go to the doctor.There is a surgery every weekday, in the morning and every day except Wednesday in the afternoon. On Saturday there is a time for emergency calls only.On Tuesday there is an{Ante-Natal clinic,}and on Thursday there is a{Well Woman and {Family Planning Clinic.}If people do not live near a chemist,they can get their medecine from the surgery,but otherwise they must use the chemist.
